entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
